New Records: Chicago White Sox snapped a 20-game losing streak in games started by Chris Flexen
Key Match Events: Chicago White Sox scored five runs in the ninth inning to win the game
Dominic Fletcher made key defensive plays including a diving catch and a throw
Gavin Sheets and Luis Robert Jr. had significant at-bats contributing to the win
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox needed to win 10 of their final 18 games to avoid tying the 1962 Mets for most losses
Chris Flexen had a strong performance on the mound
Post-Match Reflections: Interim manager Grady Sizemore highlighted the team's defense and clutch performance
The victory was seen as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played under tough shadow conditions
The White Sox's defensive plays were crucial to the win
